short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension calculates the readability stats of a medium.com article

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create compelling, easy-to-read articles on Medium with the help of this Chrome extension. It instantly calculates Flesch Reading Ease and Grade Level, helping you refine your writing by simplifying sentences, avoiding jargon, and reducing unnecessary words.

- Improve the readability of your own Medium article for your audience
- Engage with your audience using improved easy-to-read articles
- Learn from the readability scores of the best writers
- Save time with the readability score displayed at the top of every Medium.com article
